titles.title: Higher Education Study Abroad Act of 2006
A bill to support the goals of the Commission on the Abraham Lincoln Study Abroad Fellowship Program.
Higher Education Study Abroad Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Higher Education Study Abroad Act of 2006 - Urges the federal government to endorse the goals outlined by the Commission on the Abraham Lincoln Study Abroad Fellowship Program regarding expanding the opportunity for students at institutions of higher education to study abroad. Requires the Secretary of Education to review Commission recommendations and report to Congress on the feasibility of their implementation, including the feasibility of the recommended national scholarship program for study abroad.
